type: Legendary Creature – Human Nomad Lord Noble
rules_text:
Flash
[i]Lorca Tribe Heir[/i] – As long as you control a Plains, Nomads you control have first strike.
[i]Mani Katti[/i] – Whenever Lyndis, Sacaen Survivor deals combat damage to a creature, put a double strike counter onto a creature you control.
